website_summaries.verdict: A most convenient, well-made dog leash. Its rugged leather design and durable snap hook make it a highly reliable choice.
pros: Made of 100% genuine leather that's lightweight yet made to last – ideal for active dogs
Leather construction does not collect hairs (unlike some nylon leashes)
cons: It is somewhat pricey, but you are paying for a high-quality leash that will last you a lifetime

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE: POOR DURABILITY
customer_reviews.text: Update: broke on its own ( not chewed) after less than 2 months. Forgot to return it in time. Crack developed. Either poor quality control or bad product. Just received it and so far looks reasonable in size and pliability BUT TRUTH IN ADVERTISING--it says on package MADE IN CHINA, DESIGNED IN NORWAY..??? Is it still US latigo leather as advertised on the description (Full Grain Latigo Leather. Leatherberg leather leashes are made of top quality U.S. rawhide to create a strong, beautiful lead that is easy to use and clean.)? Will have to see how the leash works over time.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in the jungle

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft leash
customer_reviews.text: Very nice soft material and balanced feel to this leash. I have two Boxers, and had only one obedience leash, so decided to invest in another, and this one is perfect. Nice BLACK finish to the leash, and no bleed off onto hands or clothing, nice secure snap. I would buy this product again, and I would recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: run2it

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for a leather leash for my Pitbull mix. With all the great reviews on this leash I thought this would be the one. The only thing that I like about it was the great leather smell. Other then that, the leash was way to thin and not thick enough. It also felt flimsy when walking my dog. I had another leather leash previously that was 7 years old. My Pit pulls and after all that time it broke. I am looking for another leather leash that is just as strong as my first one. I am going to be returning this Leatherberg leash for that reason.
customer_reviews.author: Iris and Greg

customer_reviews.title: Everything You'd Want in a Leash
customer_reviews.text: You seriously can't beat a leather leash in my opinion. There's just something about holding leather. I love walking my dog with this leash, it's my go-to even though we have several other types of leashes to choose from. It folds nicely in my hand, and if I want to go hands free I can wear it cross-body and still have enough lead to have my dog heel with a little slack. If you're thinking about getting this leash, don't hesitate. I'd buy five more if I needed them, but I imagine this one will satisfy all of my needs for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash!
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research trying to decide which leather leash to purchase for our puppy (there's so much information and reviews out there, it's confusing sometimes!). I am very happy I decided on this Leatherberg leash. The leather is very soft and pliable, but also sturdy, and I don't worry about it holding her back. It has no strong smell, and the black color has not transferred onto my hands or clothes. The clasp is strong and stays locked in place well. The puppy trainer we are going to even commented that she liked our leash! Lots of happy walks to come!
customer_reviews.author: A Abbott

customer_reviews.title: My dog couldn't chew through this leash.
customer_reviews.text: The leather is highest quality, my 90 lbs. Japanese Akita couldn't gnaw through it. After 2.5 years, the little knob that your thumb catches to open the clasp that attaches to the dog collar broke off. I hate to toss the leash because it is still good. I want you all to know that my dog is always on leash as she has a strange sense of humor with other dogs. This leash took a serious amount of use. I'll contact the maker and see what they suggest and then review again.
customer_reviews.author: Halcyon

customer_reviews.title: I did a lot of research before settling on the Leatherberg and I very pleased with this leash
customer_reviews.text: I got this on the advice of a dog trainer. Her recommendation was to find a leather leash so that it doesn't slip from your hands when your puppy lunges at some distraction or the other. I did a lot of research before settling on the Leatherberg and I very pleased with this leash. It's strong, it doesn't slip and it's not too heavy. TL;DR - GET IT.
customer_reviews.author: cosmic athlete

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice leash
customer_reviews.text: My dog trainer recommended this leash. He uses it with all his training sessions. The leather is nice and helps with a good grip on the leash so it doesn't slip in your hand. I use it for a 89lb lab/staff mix and a 103lb pit. Not once have they pulled it out of my hand. The length is perfect for training them to walk beside me and not ahead of me because I can hold it at waste level and still have enough slack for them to have space.
customer_reviews.author: SimplyB

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great leash!
customer_reviews.text: Got this leash for my 40lb dog who loves to pull on her leash. We're currently leash training and originally had a nylon leash with too much give and tore up my hands. This leather leash does the trick! It's the perfect length/width, great quality, and sturdy enough to hold up to my dog's constant pulling. I've had this leash for about three months now and even with daily use it still looks just as great as it did on the day I got it. Can't beat the price either. I'm really happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: P. S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these leashes for my medium size dogs (aussie and golden) and was highly disappointed. The leather is thin and cheaply made...very flimsy! I will be returning same day that I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash!
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our growing puppy, who’s becoming much bigger than we expected. The leash feels very sturdy in your hand, with just a little flex. It is quality leather and I expect it will last a long time. Hardware is chrome, not brass, but it works fine. Our dog is over 40 pounds now and expected to get up to 50 or 60. I have no doubt this leash will be more than adequate for her.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Garland

customer_reviews.title: Leash is very nice, clasp is cheap
customer_reviews.text: The leather on this leash has a very nice feel to it and it has sold me on leather leashes - no more nylon / rope leashes for me. It does leave a strong smell on the hands, presumably from the dye used to make it black, but i expect that to dissipate over time. The only real concern i have is that the metal clasp used on this leash is hollow, lightweight and feels cheap. I expected a solid metal clasp on this expensive of a leash. However, out of laziness I am going to keep it and just replace the clasp when it fails.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific leash. My only issue is that it might ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality leather lead. My dog pulls and so I wanted a training lead that was sewn AND had a rivet. This is a terrific leash. My only issue is that it might be a little more leash than I needed for my 35 lb. dog. It is a bit heavy and so when we walk, the lead sometimes slips under her front leg. I might have been better off with a slightly thinner lead, but all that said, this is a terrific leash that we use for training many times a day. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Leather Lead
customer_reviews.text: There were so many leather leads to choose from, but I must have lucked out and chose the best. Our dog trainer of many, many years took a look at the quality and comfort of the leather and she bought a few for her own dogs. She is tough, so this is high praise indeed. I would definitely recommend this lead.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Leather Leash
customer_reviews.text: Very nice leash. The leather is soft and easy on the hands, which is important to me since I am using it on a large and rather boisterous young dog still in training. I have been using the leash about three weeks, so cannot speak to its durability, but it certainly appears to be strong and well-made. When I first took it out of the package, the leather conditioner smell was overpowering and I was a little concerned that it would linger, but a few days hanging in the fresh air completely solved this problem. If I need a second leash, this would definitely be my choice.
customer_reviews.author: Jane gurule

customer_reviews.title: Border Collie chewed through in one bite
customer_reviews.text: We liked the leather and feel of the leash, our border collie is excitable when he sees other dogs on walks. We had the leash for a few months, yesterday he turned around and chomped clean through the leash in one bite. Next time I'll be getting something more substantial, I wouldn't recommend this leash if your dog has any propensity to try and chew the leash.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Only brand of leather leash I will buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Leatherberg Leather Dog Leash I have bought. My oldest is about 7 years old and has been used for my 80lb Rhodesian Ridgeback who is all muscle. These leashes are of great quality and definitely last for a long time. This isn't fake leather, its the real deal. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: The leather broke near the clasp
customer_reviews.text: I got about 20 walks out of this leash before it broke. I have a 60 pound dog and only pulls when he sees a motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Leash to Last a Lifetime
customer_reviews.text: Best 6-foot Leather Dog Leash! Soft, supple, sturdy. If your dog suddenly leaps after a squirrel, your hand won't be cut by a hard edge leather or the awful retractable leashes that have become so popular. With minimal care, this leash will last you a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Pedoto

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid leash
customer_reviews.text: I bought this leash to replace my old one which I bought in 2000 for the dog I had then. This one is not as thick or heavy but is so much better than the nylon leashes that are so ubiquitous these days. I liked the old one better but I’m happy with this one. I recommend this leash versus the nylon ones - by far!
customer_reviews.author: Ken H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome leash!
customer_reviews.text: Been using for a month now - on my walk- aggressive (meaning he likes to lead and pulls some times) male cocker spaniel. Over all quality seems we’ll made, I checked and re-checked the sticking as I live in a high traffic area and it seams very well made and is very easy to hold!
customer_reviews.author: FLD

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful leash, I always get compliments on it
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leash, I always get compliments on it. Right out of the box, it felt like I had been using it for years, so soft and pliable. Short of the puppy chewing through it, I see this leash lasting forever! A very high quality product. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: thebigbaby

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful heavy leash
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful heavy leash made of thick leather and good hardware. It is definitely an upgrade from the nylon leashes we have purchased for our very active 8.5 months old puppy who weighs 68 pounds and gaining. I feel the weight of the leash gives me better control and the hardware is of better quality than our last nylon one (the hook would stick when we try to hook it to the collar so we always have to check to make sure it doesn't come loose when we talk!)
customer_reviews.author: LCStone

customer_reviews.title: This is the leash I've been looking for and could not find
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for years for a leather leash that was soft and flexible yet strong enough to control a 70-pound dog. After many failed purchases, I was thrilled to when I opened the packaging and felt this leash. It is exactly what I've been searching for. I used it to walk the dogs last night, and I'm going to order another one for the newest member of our canine family. High quality material and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis M.

customer_reviews.title: If I had more dogs, I'd buy more of these
customer_reviews.text: To replace a 20-year old leather leash that I no longer trusted, I ordered this leash on a Saturday and received it on Monday. What a beautiful leash! Gorgeous soft leather that was immediately supple and workable in my hand, making my exuberant puppy easier to control. Thicker than I expected and the leather has a little give. Price can't be beat, either. I can hardly wait until my dog's obedience class this weekend to let the trainer and other pet parents know about this. A friend plans to get a dog soon and I know what I will give her as a welcome present...this leash with its nice packaging will be a pleasure to give.
customer_reviews.author: Reikichik

customer_reviews.title: Good Chinese made leash
customer_reviews.text: Well made, wish it wasn't manufactured in China. I missed that in the listing and would rather have paid two to three times the amount for a product made in USA....To be fair, it is nice and soft, the latch seems of good quality. Will use until puppy destroys, if she destroys it.
customer_reviews.author: gEoFFTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this product but not durable with my dog. I had buy second one because he chewed on in matter of seconds and it was toast. I keep second one better kept up away from this time. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Jackie L Macagni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome leashes and AMAZING customer service! If possible—I would give 10 stars! Besides having wonderful leather leashes, this company goes above and beyond with their customer service and I just can’t rave about them enough! Peter (customer service manager) really took wonderful care of me and I truly appreciate everything he has done. I highly recommend this company and will definitely be back for more products in the future! Thanks again Peter! You are awesome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl F

customer_reviews.title: The quality of leather leash this is is MUCH better!! It came feeling already broken in
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a replacement leash for our other leather leash that lasted us a while but puppy eventually decided to chew through.. The quality of leather leash this is is MUCH better!! It came feeling already broken in, unlike our other ones, so there wasn't a "sore hands" period while the leather softened up. It feels very nice and so far has been durable. Puppy also seems less interested in chewing on it - always a plus. 6 foot size is perfect for tying to desk while at work and giving puppy lots of space to move but not too much :)
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Easy on the hands
customer_reviews.text: Great leash, I needed one that would not slip in my hand during class. My 4 month old gets very wound up when other dogs are around. It's nice and sturdy. Will only get better with age, the leash and the puppy that is.
customer_reviews.author: SFC B

customer_reviews.title: Not for training, not quite 6' long, and rather thin.
customer_reviews.text: Good for walking small to medium dogs up to 40 lbs, but nowhere stiff or solid enough for controlled training. My leash measured 5' 9"... not off by a lot, but also not 6' at advertised. It measures about 1/8 inch thick, which is rather thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Before you buy this...
customer_reviews.text: This leash was guaranteed for one year....I bought it in November and had to have it repaired in December, it almost split in two pieces. I took it to a shoe repair to have it sewn back together and today, April 2020, I see another rip in the leather. My dog weighs only 50 pounds and it was guaranteed for a much larger dog. I do not recommend this. Leather ripping, hmm is it real leather? What a bust. Don't buy this, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Balfour

customer_reviews.title: Price, quality top notch
customer_reviews.text: Really nice quality leash. Stitching is of high quality and the packaging compliments the quality product. I would prefer brass hardware as opposed to stainless but all in all for the price the quality supersedes a trivial issues such as color of hardware. Very please all in all
customer_reviews.author: Ken J

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash. We don’t allow our dog to chew her leash so I couldn’t rate that but it seems very durable and it is very comfortable to hold. Perfect 6’ length. Favorite leash by far and we tried many.
customer_reviews.author: JSN345

customer_reviews.title: Stiching coming loose or fraying, one at the top of the leash where the handle is and one at the base where the hook is.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought the large dog collar and also the traffic leash from this company, both seem to be holding up great. However, the leather leash just isn't holding up to even moderate use, I walk the dog once a day and the stitching is already pulling out or fraying and I've had it for not even 2 months now, in two different locations.
customer_reviews.author: Woodmeister

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: I like it well enough. It feels very sturdy and the length of the leash has softened nicely. However the inside of the handle loop is much rougher than the rest of the leash, this is hard on my hands. Not sure if it is just mine that is like this.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Wallace

customer_reviews.title: She pulls a lot during walks and we needed something sturdy to resist her strength
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this leash in June 2016 for our 65-70lb labrador retriever. She pulls a lot during walks and we needed something sturdy to resist her strength. The leather has a little bit of give to it but it doesn't flex and extend as much as a rope leash. Plus, the leather is so much more comfortable to hold vs a traditional nylon strap leash. We live in a wet climate and have never had any issue with the leather getting wet and drying. This leash has worked great for us, at a reasonable price, and I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and feels good in your hand
customer_reviews.text: Strong, comfortable and feels good in your hand. (Hey, Get Your Mind Out Of The Gutter)! All kidding aside, beautiful leash. Well worth the money if you walk your dog on a regular basis. UPDATE: I don't know what is happening but 2 times now she got off the leash. Thank goodness she came back to me. I'm going to tape the latch and keep my fingers crossed.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F

customer_reviews.title: I now love walking my dog
customer_reviews.text: Finally, I get to lead and he gets to follow. I would come home exhausted from walks and used to dread taking him. He's an 85 pound Wemariner that has a mind of his own (even though he did pass basic training) and I'm 105lb woman. I had always thought leashes were all created equal. It's very well made and makes a good team for the collar I purchased. (Hem Sprenger Prong Collar)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a leader lead that's perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I've been looking for ! It's amazing how hard it is to find a quality leather lead in the local pet supply boutiques and in the big chain stores . This leather product is the Real Deal! And it's priced low for the quality. I smiled at the disclaimer printed on the box " not chew proof ". Well, maybe not but I know this leather will be harder for my 90 pound German shepherd pup to chew through my 2 year old Shepherd'a lead when he playfully takes it in his mouth in an attempt to help me walk them !
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for big dogs as posted
customer_reviews.text: Leather for this leash is VERY soft If you have a dog that pulls it is not recommend I bought two of these leashes and both have cracked and split Didn’t even have them for two weeks Manufacturers did get ahold of me and sent me a new leash No charge. The same thing happened Do strongly recommend not buy if you have a big dog. 😞
customer_reviews.author: cheryl shiels

customer_reviews.title: I have referred everyone in our puppy class!
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels amazing! Since owning this, walking our puppy is so much easier and I feel like we have so much more control. Feels great in the hand and I know we will have this for a very long time! The leather leashes for sale at the store near us are $50+ and feel hard are much thinner. This leash is soft and high quality- for an amazing price! I have referred everyone in our puppy class! Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: Perfect leather dog leash. It's thick, durable, and very well made. The leather quality is exceptional. I like that the leash has one rivet and is sewn together around the rivet. Most leashes only have rivets or stitching. This leash has both. I'd have to say this is the best leather dog leash I've ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Derek B.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it would be a strong leash to own ...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a strong leash to own. Didn't use it very much. But a short car ride home maybe 7 minutes, that's all it took. A picture says it all. The dog is a Golden Doodle.
customer_reviews.author: CT from Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Love this leash
customer_reviews.text: Love the leash just wish it would have a extra loop closer to the end before the bolt snap hook it would make it easier when having to pull the dog closer. Great quality leather and stitching and metal grommets.
customer_reviews.author: gail

customer_reviews.title: This leash is really comfortable in the hand
customer_reviews.text: This leash is really comfortable in the hand, and has proven less interesting as a potential chewing target than other leather leashes with braids, etc., that we've had. It is by far the easiest lead to use to walk our standard poodle, who has a lot of strength & energy.
customer_reviews.author: renaissance gal

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Great quality made leash. Good leather that’s not too stiff, very durable. I use it for my gsd Narcotics K9 with no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Joe chitwood

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Some of the leather leaches out there are very stiff, or just obviously poor quality, this is neither. Very comfortable in the hands, extra support with rivets and stitching, overall can tell its a good quality leash.
customer_reviews.author: Morty

customer_reviews.title: Happy dog walks
customer_reviews.text: Takes a few months for the leather smell to go away, but it's not a bad odor. Works as intended.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Great quality affordable leash
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this leash. The leather is supple and soft yet feels very “solid”. Feels comfortable in my hand during walks. Great construction — one solid strip with reinforced grommets. I have a 75 pound bearded collie and the leash seems sturdy enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Besbeas

customer_reviews.title: Glad I Purchased This Leash
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews I decided on this dog leash and I am glad I did. My 100 lb mastiff-mix is not a leash chewer or a puller so I can't address those issues but this is a very nice leash. It seems very sturdy and well made, the clasp seems secure and the leather has a very soft feel to it. Nice purchase
customer_reviews.author: K.O.

customer_reviews.title: but it still requires me to wash my hands after we walk because it stinks so bad. It's not a classic leather smell
customer_reviews.text: Smells SO strong. I don't know if its the dye or what, it smells really gross. Its been airing out for several weeks, but it still requires me to wash my hands after we walk because it stinks so bad. It's not a classic leather smell, it smells artificial and chemicall-y
customer_reviews.author: KittytoTigerTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: All things considered I am satisfied with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in advance of taking my puppy home, so have not used it yet. I think I'll need something lighter until the puppy gets bigger, but I think this will be find for the dog as he gets older. The leather is soft, but strong and the connector is high quality. All things considered I am satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J. Kephart

customer_reviews.title: A must buy product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent well made product which has my strongest unqualified recommendation as a must buy leash. It's very strong and well made. I have no doubt that it will last many years. I like the feel of a slightly wider leash, but this leash is excellent. Maybe they will offer a 7/8 or even a full one inch wide leash in the future. Regardless, my comment does NOT diminish this great product in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Leo’s

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash
customer_reviews.text: Nice length, very well made, nice thickness of leather. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather, excellent quality and packaging
customer_reviews.text: This leash has a little give when dog pulls, so if you're looking for a firm hold, beware. It feels great in hand, almost like "broken in" soft but durable. The color is a gorgeous dark brown and excellent quality. It came in a nice box. Would make a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best leash
customer_reviews.text: Had this leash for 3+ years and it's amazing! Our 85 lb dog used to tug so much and regular leashes will burn your hands, but not this one! It's sturdy and is easy to clean. Truly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Teddyee

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable leash
customer_reviews.text: Product was great butt unfortunately mine broke at the handle few months ago. And i just checked and it states it has a year warranty but I've only had the leash since May 2020 and its saying not under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Duran

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great! The leather is very sturdy and I have no worries of it breaking while walking my 110lb dog. The leather is not stiff and broke in very quickly. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty nice to me. The stretchyness is a bit disconcerting, but seems it is way more than strong enough and the stretch lends some give when the pup pulls. Edges are beveled, leather feels and looks nice. I'm happy with the two I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Admiral Obvious

customer_reviews.title: not stiff like the leather leads sold at big pet stores
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality leather! It has a very supple feel to it, not stiff like the leather leads sold at big pet stores. Feels great when walking, and absorbs some shock if the dog pulls or jerks. This leash will last a long time, we use it daily for our walks and has not shown any signs of tearing or spots wearing thin. The buckles at each end are very strong. It's a metal stamped rivet as well as stitching, extra reinforced.
customer_reviews.author: VetTechKtl

customer_reviews.title: Strong, durable leash
customer_reviews.text: Great leash for my 75 lb., very strong Labradoodle. Much better than the 1/2 inch leash.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: Broken latch
customer_reviews.text: Upon further inspection of the leash I discovered the latch was bent which made this leash unusable. It will be going back for a return
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: I am a professional trainer, this is all I use.
customer_reviews.text: I train dogs for a living. This is all I use and recommend to clients. I grew up riding horses and know what good tac feels like. This feels luxurious and supple in the hand. You can not do better.
customer_reviews.author: George Matheis Jr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leash. The last leash we had was a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leash. The last leash we had was a pain and chafed my index finger. This one is a dream and does not hurt at all. Has a little bit of tension which is frankly perfect for the kind of mid-sized (52 pound) dog we have. Could not be happier with this purchase. Strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: skyspeak

customer_reviews.title: Great leash!
customer_reviews.text: It was a good weight and felt good in my hand. It is long enough to let the dog move ahead a bit if wanted but can be rolled up quickly to shorten it without extra leash in the way. It is smooth and not rough in texture. I really like it and wish I had bought this one last year for my other pup.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and supple
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, strong and supple. Great for medium to large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: David G. Meade

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have better control of my dog using this leash vs my nylon one.
customer_reviews.author: Shari C.

customer_reviews.title: Great leather lead and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this leather lead in 2017 for my Lab pup. It has been a great leash. Durable and strong. It stays wet when we are at the river or lake and it still looks brand new. I also use this leash non stop. Would totally recommend as it has held up great.
customer_reviews.author: aarech

customer_reviews.title: Great leashes, I now have two!
customer_reviews.text: I have two strong dogs and these leashes are perfect. They are very soft and supple, just the right weight and length and very well made. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: SARAH

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality. Very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: Product came in a timely manner. Very good quality. Very happy with this purchase. Updated 11/27/2016: We bought the first one earlier in the year. Just got another dog and liked this leash so much we bought another. Very good quality product. Delivered in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Nice leash for walks.
customer_reviews.text: Nice leash. Very comfortable and strong. Easy to hold. Soft thick leather.
customer_reviews.author: JZK

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great training leash. Soft in my hands but strong for sharp corrections with my dog.
customer_reviews.author: BJ33

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. The lead that gets used.
customer_reviews.text: Love that this leash comes already treated and broken in. The clasp weight is perfect -- it doesn't pull the attachment point on the collar down to the dog's chest or bang against his shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: J. King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these leashes. High quality. You can't beat a good leather leash, and you can't beat Leatherberg, Let me add, I run dog training classes for dogs of all sizes. I have used this with 130 lb Cane Corsos, to 6 lb Chihuahuas. I always recommend leather leashes to my clients, and recommend Leatherberg when they are buying one. I have two pit bulls personally, and these leashes have never failed me.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel T. Steinmetz

customer_reviews.title: Quality leash
customer_reviews.text: Quality, well built leash. Sturdier, ticket leather than what I've seen in stores, for same or less money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: High quality real leather lead
customer_reviews.text: Quality leather lead. Soft on hands yet durable. Knew when I opened the box it was high quality just from the smell. Gotta love that true real leather aroma! Would purchase again and definitely recommend to anyone looking for a leather lead.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret R.

customer_reviews.title: Best leash ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Dog Leash I have ever bought, even the packaging is first class. I just received it today and I was totally surprised at the quality and softness of this leather. The leash is not heavy, feels extremely comfortable and coils very nicely in you hand. I have a cream English golden retriever he is 80 Lbs.+ what I like is the leather has enough give in it when he pulls that he knows he better stop. If you are looking for a quality professional leash I would highly recommend this leash seems like even the dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jeff S

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It is strong but sometimes feels like it is going to break. i am sure it won't but with the soft leather it seems to stretch when a big dog pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I prefer a six foot leather leash and this one is perfect for my 60 lb. Shepherd / Rottweiler. He can pull like a sled dog at times, and this product has just enough "give" when that happens. It is both stitched and riveted at the handle and clasp, and the leather is thick, strong and pliable. The clasp is substantial, which completes the package. My dog, Clyde, and I give it two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: fiddlin' Bob

customer_reviews.title: Dog trainer recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: This leash was recommended to me by two dog trainers. It is a beautifully crafted leash and perfect for training and walking your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Linda410

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality for great price
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this leash for almost 3 years now and it has stayed in perfect condition. I have a large German Shepherd and this leash is sturdy and durable. I have been amazed by its quality for such a good price. Buying another for our new dog and would highly recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made, durable leather dog leash. It's great for training or everyday walks. I'd highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sickpup94

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Golden Retriever Puppies
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my golden retriever puppy, and although he wanted to bite it while we walked at first, it works great. He is now walking well and it's not too heavy for him. I can also tell it will hold well over time.
customer_reviews.author: STMoney

customer_reviews.title: Excelent leash!
customer_reviews.text: The leash arrived well packaged and earlier than expected. It's much like the strong well made full-grained leather leash I was given by a professional dog trainer years ago. The six foot length is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: R. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love this leash. It's classy, no big branding, well-made, and has some stretch to it which helps when walking my puppy. No residue left on my hands after use and no rash from holding, like the nylon leash I used to have. Will be curious to see how it holds up long-term.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie S

customer_reviews.title: Solid, quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Solid product. Similar in construction quality to leather leashes I bought more than 20 years ago. Hard to find that anymore. Only suggestion would be to add an additional rivet where the buckle connects to the end of leash. But a very solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Reiter

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if the metal clasp had a better coating
customer_reviews.text: This is a solid leash. It would be better if the metal clasp had a better coating. We live near the beach and the salt water and salt air quickly make the clasp difficult to open. So, I have to oil it periodically. Otherwise, it's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: R O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Prefer the darker leather
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 3 of these leashes, and like the quality, and feel it is made well. Two of the leashes were a darker color and were really sturdy, the brown one Was flimsy by comparison. I thought at first there was a difference in thickness , bit it’s two different types of leather.
customer_reviews.author: Tres Dolan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality & Smart looking & So functional!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this leash!!!! So pliable, 6’ great for training, the latch is good quality too. I have tried 3 different leashes, 2 nylon & a braided fleece. Can’t compare! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like mine
customer_reviews.text: Exactly want I want. Great quality all around. I think this will last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: PWDerry

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Dog Leash
customer_reviews.text: This leash was recommended by our trainer. It is very good quality and looks good too. It is hard to find leather dog leashes of this quality. We like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Skatvold

customer_reviews.title: Strong Leather Leash.
customer_reviews.text: this is a very good Leather leash . i walk my 10 month boxer every day .. i had this leash for around 4 months, i train my dog with this leash.very strong leash. some times dog sees a cat wants to run after it..i pull him back .. with no worries that leash will snap. i strongly recommend this leash.
customer_reviews.author: s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is the best collar I have ever seen. Stylish yet real soft and genuine leather. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Efte209

customer_reviews.title: Great leash
customer_reviews.text: Love this leash nice on the hands . Great for long walks
customer_reviews.author: jaime lopez

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Lost my last one ..Best leash . Soft leather. Just perfect
customer_reviews.author: sumboxcar182

customer_reviews.title: Great Leash for Walking and Training
customer_reviews.text: We were impressed with the timely delivery of the leather leash. Our trainer recommended that we buy a leather leash to train our new English Setter rescue. This leash fits easily in my hand and is comfortable for training. It has just the right amount of give, while being strong and sturdy. I highly recommend this leather leash for training and walking."
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B

customer_reviews.title: Stretches to the point it is not usable
customer_reviews.text: We used this leash for a month and it has lengthened by roughly 50 % and can no longer be used. Not durable. The leather stretches so much. Our dog is 60 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: Starting to tear after 2weeks!
customer_reviews.text: Quality is not good. It stretches a lot. Starting to tear, sending back for a redund.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: Best leash. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought my first one 3 years ago. Been used through all weathers and still tough as the first day with my German shepherd. Just got my 2nd one for new puppy addition. It's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cslug

product_meta.title: LEATHERBERG Leather Dog Training Leash 6 Ft Long x 3/4" Wide Dog Walking Leash Best for Medium Large Dogs, Latigo Leather Dog Lead & Puppy Trainer Leash
feature_bullets: 6 FOOT LEATHER LEASH YOU CAN TRUST - Have you been looking for a durable leather dog leash? Then your search is OVER! Leatherberg leather leash is made of top quality 100% real leather with strong double stitching and a metal rivet on each end. Our Leatherberg dog training leash will hold up all dog breeds.

PAIN - FREE WALKING AND TRAINING - Leatherberg leather leashes are made of 100% real Latigo leather. It's soft yet durable and absorbs some of the pull. We use the same leather material to make our leather dog leashes as other top brands in the U.S.
GET YOURS LEATHERBERG TODAY WHILE SUPPLIES LASTS - Check our special offers and product promotions below. Get 2 or more leather leashes and save money.

TRUSTED - Why Do Amazon Customers Give Our 6ft Leather Dog Leash 5-Star Ratings? Our dog training leash is the #1 choice because of its professional grade quality. You'll be able easily control and train a dog with this amazing tool.

100% RISK FREE PURCHASE - “Does this dog leash leather come with a money back guarantee? YES! Your purchase comes with a full 1 year no-risk, no-nonsense 100% Money Back Guarantee. Either you’re thrilled, or we don’t want your money! See why Amazon customers rate our pet leash 5-Stars!”
